articles.author: Bryan Mena
articles.title: Slower inflation is boosting Americans’ attitudes toward the economy - CNN
articles.description: Americans are feeling a greater sense of optimism about the US economy this month, thanks to slower inflation. Voters also see a greater likelihood that Vice President Kamala Harris will defeat former President Donald Trump in the upcoming November election.
